headline: Caesars Entertainment Shares Surge 19% On Reported Takeover Interest From Billionaire Tilman Fertitta
summary: Caesars Entertainment is considering takeover offers, including one from Fertitta Entertainment, as it reports record digital profits.

headline: Caesars Entertainment shares are trading higher following reports suggesting that the company is considering a sale. Several bidders, including Fertitta Entertainment, expressed interest in acquiring the company.
